name: Soccer Juggler
description:
**HOW MANY TIMES CAN YOU JUGGLE A SOCCER BALL?**
**DO YOU WANT TO BE THE BEST SOCCER JUGGLER?**
**DOWNLOAD THE GAME AND JUGGLE THE SOCCER NOW!**
**COMPETE FOR THE TOP JUGGLER WITH WORLDWIDE PLAYERS!**

RULES:
* Kick the soccer up and keep it from the ground.You get one point for each kick.
* Kick the soccer to hit the target on the roof.You get two points for each hit.

FEATURES
* Simple but challenging
* Game Center Supported
* High quality UI
* Three scenes
* Share via Email/SMS/Facebook/Twitter

HAPPY JUGGLING!!!HAVE FUN!!!
